## InheritanceType.append type

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Append additional elements after elements from the parent file's property. Only applicable for arrays.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type append = typeof InheritanceType.append;
```
